alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Boone; Marion; Newton; Searcy (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 8:31AM CDT until March 30 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Newton County in north central Arkansas... Marion County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Boone County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern Baxter County in north central Arkansas... * Until 915 AM CDT. * At 831 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pruitt to near Piercetown to 6 miles south of Carver, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Harrison... Bull Shoals... Yellville... Gassville... Flippin... Lakeview in Baxter County... Bergman... Western Grove... Pyatt... Valley Springs... Arkawana... Dugger... Olvey... Carver... Ozark Regional Airport... Ozark Isle... Lakeway... Bull Shoals State Park... Winington... Clark Hill... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for north central Arkansas.
